item.title: Testing Object IDs Command
item.dc:creator: @lets_use_dds lets use dds
item.description:
@lets_use_dds wrote:

If you find yourself wanting to test an object without recompiling the server and shit, i have made a command to spawn objects similar to ::npc but with objects. I know there is an ::object command but that seems to never work out for me, so i decided to fix/make it better.

First search for "object" until you find the one dealing with the command. Then delete that stupid command.

Replace it with this:

else if ((command.startsWith("object") && command.length() > 7) && playerRights >= 2) { int object = Integer.parseInt(command.substring(7)); createNewTileObject(absX, absY, object, 0, 10); }
now compile and then on the server type: ::object IDHERE
dont forget the space after object, and replace IDHERE with the object id.

Read full topic
